com.ibm.lpex.alef
Class LpexContextContributor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.lpex.alef.LpexContextContributor
public class LpexContextContributor
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.ibm.eclipse.ui.IEditorActionBarContributor

Basic LPEX contributions to the Eclipse context. Editor plugins using the LPEX plugin must extend this class in order to add their own Eclipse contributions.

Each workbench part has an associated context. Creating a context contributor and adding this contributor to the context ensures that contributions will be made for the part. Visibility of the contributions will automatically be controlled in accordance to part visibility.

editorChanged

public void editorChanged(com.ibm.eclipse.ui.IEditorPart editorPart)
An editor of the type for which this contributor has been registered, has been activated. Action are reconnected and their enable state is updated. Activation of editors that do not match the contributor's type are ignored.
Specified by:
editorChanged in interface com.ibm.eclipse.ui.IEditorActionBarContributor
Parameters:
editorPart - the editor of the matching type that has been activated
See Also:
IEditorActionBarContributor.editorChanged(com.ibm.eclipse.ui.IEditorPart)

init

public void init(com.ibm.eclipse.ui.IActionBars actionBars)
Initializes the context contributor. The contributor is expected to add contributions as required to the action bars and global action handlers.
